articles.title: 7 Reasons I'm Ditching My AirPods (And You Might Too)
articles.author: Ray Malik
articles.summary: AirPods became a cultural phenomenon when they came out in 2016. After two years of regular use, the battery life of AirPods has declined. They are not designed to be serviced by you, so trying to replace the batteries can damage the device itself. Apple offers a battery service program for $49 per AirPod.

The original location held 35 different vendors who specialized in handmade gifts, body care and baked goods.

articles.title: Microsoft will close Skype in May 2025
articles.author: Natasha Kumar
articles.summary: After 22 years of service, Skype will close its doors in May 2025. Skype was bought by Microsoft in 2011 for $8.5 billion. Skype has been supplanted by Zoom, Whatsapp or Telegram. France-Soir will continue to offer its articles for free.

articles.title: 'Jetsons' robot finally arrives: Sweater-wearing Neo Gamma android helps with household chores

articles.summary: Norwegian robotics company 1X has unveiled a knitted-nylon-covered humanoid robot designed to complete household chores. The robot is not ready to go on sale to the public, but it has been made available for limited testing in some homes to test the robot's navigational, speech and body language AI features.

articles.title: Google Announces Updates to Display Network Campaigns
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google has announced some updates to its Google Display Ads network. Google is adding more ad inventory across a range of platforms and categories, including news, sports, social and gaming. It's also adding Google Display inventory to Demand Gen campaigns. Google's also rolling out new creative templates for Display ads and launching new improvements to elevate the quality of ad placements.

articles.summary: Netflix is discontinuing service on some older smart TVs due to technological advancements. The most common solution is using a dedicated streaming device like Roku, Apple TV, Chromecast, and Amazon Fire Stick. Game consoles like PlayStation and Xbox are also viable options. TV manufacturers and streaming services will need to find a balance between innovation and backwards compatibility.

articles.title: Meet the world's fastest-growing global device refurbisher

It has refurbished more than six million devices, including smartphones, tablets, wearables and laptops. It took 18 months to build the necessary technology and $2.5m of pre-seed investment from Macquarie, an Australian financial group.

articles.title: GWM Cannon Lux 2025 review: snapshot

articles.summary: The Lux is the new entry-level version of the GWM Cannon ute range. It's a dual-cab with permanent four-wheel-drive, a transfer-case and uses body-on-frame construction. It has a new 2.4-litre engine with more power and torque than before. It uses less fuel per 100km than the old version. It can tow 3500kg on a braked trailer.

articles.summary: Varun Grover is a recognized LinkedIn Top Voice in technology and product marketing professional. He has an MBA from the University of Minnesota's Carlson School of Management and studies in Computer Science at Georgia Institute of Technology. His early career as a software engineer in the Asia-Pacific region at Western Digital laid the groundwork for his transition into product marketing leadership. He helped grow direct-to-consumer lending revenue from $30 million to $100 million at a leading FinTech company.

articles.title: ET CX Annual Symposium 2025: Kitchen to customer's heart - chef Sanjeev Kapoor's recipe
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: The product development team at Wonderchef created a non-stick pan that acts as a regular iron pan for 45 seconds after the batter is poured on the pan and then releases its properties only after that. Sanjeev Kapoor's culinary innovations stem from deeply understanding consumer pain points and transforming them into opportunities for connection.

articles.title: J&K Bank opens new branch in Srinagar's Umerabad
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: The J&K Bank has opened a new branch at Umerabad area on the outskirts of Srinagar. The branch was inaugurated by the bank's MD & CEO Amitava Chatterjee. The event was joined by residents, senior citizens, and customers of the area.

articles.title: Zelenskyy's humiliation in the White House
articles.author: The editorial board
articles.summary: The verdict is in on the new Chicken Big Mac from McDonald's and it's not as good as the old one, as previously reported 3 years ago. The new one is called the "Chicken Big Mac" and costs $2.50 per person.

articles.title: Apple Home products need to solve the biggest smart home problem
articles.author: Ben Lovejoy
articles.summary: Philips Hue color ambiance bulb failed a couple of days ago. He ordered a replacement and used the Home app to scan the QR code on the bulb. The app couldn't identify the bulb, so he backed out and used a different app to do it.

articles.title: 2 juveniles charged with capital murder after Pleasanton murder
articles.summary: To stream KENS 5 on your phone, you need the KENS 5 app. It's free and available for Android and iOS devices. It is available on Google Play and Apple's Play Store. It costs about $0.99 per app.

articles.title: Back in black: Portland Thorns unveil new primary jerseys
articles.author: JOEL ODOM The Oregonian
articles.summary: The Portland Thorns released their new jerseys on Thursday. The black jerseys with red accents represent the embers burning at the heart of the Thorns and their supporters. The Thorns' new sponsor, Ring, is emblazoned in white across the jersey.

articles.title: How to whiten clothes, towels and bedding fast and naturally without vinegar
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: Lemon juice is an alternative to bleach to whiten laundry. Thomas Bird, textiles expert and owner of Fabrics Online has shared his quick and easy hack to restore your whites to their former glory. He recommends using lemon juice to make your whites whiter.

articles.title: Prompt Engineering For Advanced Multi-Agent AI Prompting
articles.author: Lance Eliot
articles.summary: In today's Forbes column, I identify and showcase a new prompting approach that serves to best make use of multi-agentic AI. The world is headed toward having a zillion agentic AI agents that do this or that. There will be more AI agents than you can poke a stick at. The good news is that there will be plenty of agentic AIs to choose from.

articles.title: MADE IN EGYPT: PROTON LAUNCHES LOCALLY ASSEMBLED SAGA WITH EZZ ELARAB (PROTON Holdings Berhad)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Proton's international sales division announced the launch of the locally assembled Proton Saga in Egypt on 28 February 2025. PROTON will explore opportunities to introduce other products to Egypt as well.    - Proton is Malaysia's iconic model to duplicate its success story overseas.

articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Jonah Joseph saw two well-to-do men wearing different shirts in 2016. One of them wore a shirt that was not properly ironed. The other one wore a perfectly ironed shirt. Jonah Joseph noticed the difference and contacted the other one who was shutting down because of the unit price.

articles.title: Brand new
articles.author: Genny McCutcheon
articles.summary: I bought a new hairbrush. The old one looked like it had been dragged through remote jungle swamps. It didn't matter that I detangled hair over and over and soaked and soaked it. The wear and tear took its toll and the new one is much better.
